6100.name: Middle Penetration
6100.desc: Passive: All midfielders & defenders in the middle have their short passing, dribbling and ball control +3%
6100.desc_cn: 被动：处于中路的中场、后卫球员短传、盘带、控球属性提高3%/5%
6100.desc_en: Passive: All midfielders & defenders in the middle have their short passing, dribbling and ball control +3%

6102.name: Both-side Attack
6102.desc: Passive: All midfielders & defenders on the side have their long passing, speed and dribbling +3%
6102.desc_cn: 被动：处于边路的中场、后卫球员长传、速度、盘带属性提高3%/5%
6102.desc_en: Passive: All midfielders & defenders on the side have their long passing, speed and dribbling +3%

6103.name: Long Shot Master
6103.desc: Passive: Increases the power of long shots and shots by 2% of all forwards & midfielders
6103.desc_cn: 被动：前锋、中场球员远射、射门力量属性提高2%/4%/6%/8%/10%
6103.desc_en: Passive: Increases the power of long shots and shots by 2% of all forwards & midfielders

6105.name: Penalty Zone Master
6105.desc: Passive: All forwards & midfielders have their shooting and heading +2%
6105.desc_cn: 被动：前锋、中场球员射术、头球属性提高2%/4%/6%/8%/10%
6105.desc_en: Passive: All forwards & midfielders have their shooting and heading +2%

6106.name: Agile Follow Shot
6106.desc: Passive: Follow shot chance +2%, follow shot percentage +2%
6106.desc_en: Passive: Follow shot chance +2%, follow shot percentage +2%

6107.name: Power Headshot
6107.desc: Passive: Head shot chance +2%, head shot percentage +2%
6107.desc_en: Passive: Head shot chance +2%, head shot percentage +2%

6108.name: Free Kick Master
6108.desc: Passive: Shooting percentage +2% at penalty kick & direct free kick; passing percentage +2% at corner kick & indirect free kick
6108.desc_cn: 被动：点球和直接任意球时，射门成功率提高2%/4%/6%/8%/10%；角球和间接任意球时，传球成功率提高2%/4%/6%/8%/10%；
6108.desc_en: Passive: Shooting percentage +2% at penalty kick & direct free kick; passing percentage +2% at corner kick & indirect free kick

6109.name: Sudden Strike
6109.desc: Passive: Players in the mid have shooting range +30m, shooting chance +5%, goalkeepers butterfinger chance +30%
6109.desc_cn: 被动：中路球员的射门范围提高30米，且射门几率提高5%，门将脱手几率提高30%
6109.desc_en: Passive: Players in the mid have shooting range +30m, shooting chance +5%, goalkeepers butterfinger chance +30%

6110.name: Diving
6110.desc: Passive: 5% (2.5% in penalty zone) to dive for a foul when dribbling and moving; -20% injury or cripple chance
6110.desc_cn: 被动：带球移动时有5%（禁区内2.5%）几率跳水骗取犯规；降低20%受伤或致残几率
6110.desc_en: Passive: 5% (2.5% in penalty zone) to dive for a foul when dribbling and moving; -20% injury or cripple chance

6111.name: Cross from Baseline
6111.desc: Passive: Side players will choose to cross from baseline when dribbling. Passing percentage +30%
6111.desc_cn: 被动：边路球员盘带时会选择下底传中，且传中时传球成功率提高30%
6111.desc_en: Passive: Side players will choose to cross from baseline when dribbling. Passing percentage +30%

6200.name: Breakaway Training
6200.desc: Passive: +3% to defense & playmaking of defenders
6200.desc_cn: 被动：后卫球员防守、组织属性提高3%/5%
6200.desc_en: Passive: +3% to defense & playmaking of defenders

6202.name: Take Back
6202.desc: Passive: +3% to attack & defense of forwards
6202.desc_cn: 被动：前锋球员进攻、防守属性提高3%/5%
6202.desc_en: Passive: +3% to attack & defense of forwards

6203.name: Fast Break
6203.desc: Passive: +2% to speed of forwards when other players in the team successfully tackle or slide tackle
6203.desc_cn: 被动：本方有球员抢断或铲断成功时，前锋球员速度提高2%/4%/6%/8%/10%
6203.desc_en: Passive: +2% to speed of forwards when other players in the team successfully tackle or slide tackle

6204.name: All-rounder
6204.desc: Passive: All stats +1% for the entire team
6204.desc_en: Passive: All stats +1% for the entire team

6205.name: Improved Tackle
6205.desc: Passive: +3% to tackle success rate of midfielders & forwards
6205.desc_cn: 被动：中场及前锋球员抢断成功率提高3%/6%/9%/12%/15%
6205.desc_en: Passive: +3% to tackle success rate of midfielders & forwards

6206.name: One-touch
6206.desc: Passive: When midfielders take the ball, they have a 5% chance to pass to a forward directly to start a fast break
6206.desc_cn: 被动：中场球员接球后，有5%/10%/15%/20%/25%概率直接传给前锋球员进行反击
6206.desc_en: Passive: When midfielders take the ball, they have a 5% chance to pass to a forward directly to start a fast break

6207.name: Solo Drive
6207.desc: Passive: +5% to attack when solo driving
6207.desc_cn: 被动：处于单刀射门时，进攻属性将提高5%/10%/15%/20%/25%
6207.desc_en: Passive: +5% to attack when solo driving

6208.name: Stable Dribble
6208.desc: Passive: +5% to dribbling & ball control for all our players. -1% chance of being tackled
6208.desc_en: Passive: +5% to dribbling & ball control for all our players. -1% chance of being tackled

6209.name: Offside Trap
6209.desc: Passive: Player ignores the offside rules while passing. Passing to players in offside position is possible
6209.desc_cn: 被动：球员传球时无视越位限制，可传球给越位球员
6209.desc_en: Passive: Player ignores the offside rules while passing. Passing to players in offside position is possible

6210.name: Infinite Will
6210.desc: Passive: +0.3% to all stats of all players in our team for every minute passed
6210.desc_cn: 被动：随着比赛进行，本方球员每分钟提高0.3%全属性
6210.desc_en: Passive: +0.3% to all stats of all players in our team for every minute passed

6211.name: Active Tackle
6211.desc: Passive: +5% tackle chance to midfielders & forwards. 30% to tackle back when tackled by opponents
6211.desc_cn: 被动：中场及前锋球员抢断几率提高5%，被抢断后有30%几率即可反抢
6211.desc_en: Passive: +5% tackle chance to midfielders & forwards. 30% to tackle back when tackled by opponents

6300.name: Tackle
6300.desc: Passive: +3% to tackling & sliding tackling for defenders
6300.desc_cn: 被动：后卫球员抢断、铲断属性提高3%/5%
6300.desc_en: Passive: +3% to tackling & sliding tackling for defenders

6302.name: Close Defense
6302.desc: Passive: +3% to interception & strength of defenders
6302.desc_cn: 被动：后卫球员干扰、强壮属性提高3%/5%
6302.desc_en: Passive: +3% to interception & strength of defenders

6303.name: Aggressive Defense
6303.desc: Passive: +1% to tack chance & slide tackle chance of all our players
6303.desc_cn: 被动：本方所有球员抢断及铲断几率提高1%/2%/3%/4%/5%
6303.desc_en: Passive: +1% to tack chance & slide tackle chance of all our players

6304.name: Super Save
6304.desc_cn: 被动：门将的守门属性提高1%/2%/3%/4%/5%

6305.name: Infinite Stamina
6305.desc: Passive: -3% to stamina consumption of our team
6305.desc_cn: 被动：本方体能消耗速度降低3%/6%/9%/12%/15%
6305.desc_en: Passive: -3% to stamina consumption of our team

6306.name: Cripple
6306.desc: Passive: Opponents have +3% chance to injury or cripple when our team slide tackle or tackle
6306.desc_cn: 被动：球员铲球或抢断时，对手致残及致伤几率提高3%/6%/9%/12%/15%
6306.desc_en: Passive: Opponents have +3% chance to injury or cripple when our team slide tackle or tackle

6307.name: Aerial Defense
6307.desc: Passive: +2% to interception & heading of defenders & midfielders
6307.desc_cn: 被动：后卫、中场球员干扰、头球属性提高2%/4%/6%/8%/10%
6307.desc_en: Passive: +2% to interception & heading of defenders & midfielders

6308.name: Foul Control
6308.desc: Passive: Chance to foul -3% (20% in penalty zone)
6308.desc_en: Passive: Chance to foul -3% (20% in penalty zone)

6309.name: Charging
6309.desc: Passive: Cripple level +1, 3%/6%/9%/12%/15% chance to gain possession directly when tackling or sliding tackling
6309.desc_cn: 被动：致残等级+1，且铲球或抢断时，有3%/6%/9%/12%/15%直接获得球权
6309.desc_en: Passive: Cripple level +1, 3%/6%/9%/12%/15% chance to gain possession directly when tackling or sliding tackling

6310.name: Unfair Call
6310.desc: Passive: 30% to reduce penalty when receiving a penalty; 20% for opponent's goal to become offside & invalid
6310.desc_cn: 被动：被判罚时，有30%几率降低处罚力度；对手进球时，有20%几率被吹罚越位进球无效
6310.desc_en: Passive: 30% to reduce penalty when receiving a penalty; 20% for opponent's goal to become offside & invalid

6311.name: Raid
6311.desc_cn: 被动：降低本方球员技能冷却时间20%
